text: main ( ) { int t , i , j , k = 1 , flag = 0 ; long int count = 0 , ans ; long int n ; long long int a [ 100001 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } count = 0 ; i = 0 ; while ( i < n - 1 ) { if ( a [ i ] > a [ i + 1 ] ) i ++ ; else { j = i ; k = 0 ; while ( j < n - 1 ) { if ( a [ j ] <= a [ j + 1 ] ) { count ++ ; j ++ ; k ++ ; } else break ; } flag = k ; while ( k -- ) { count = count + k ; } i = i + flag ; } } ans = count + n ; printf ( "%ld" , ans ) ; } }
